00019 template <int N, typename T2, int C2, typename T1, int C1>
00020 struct Convertible : public boost::mpl::bool_<
00021     (((C2>=C1 && C1>=0) || (C2<=C1 && C1<=0) || (N == 1 && C2 == -C1)) 
00022      && boost::is_convertible<T2*,T1*>::value)
00023 > {};

00033 template <typename T, int N, int C>
00034 struct ArrayTraits {
00035     typedef T Element;
00036     typedef boost::mpl::int_<N> ND;
00037     typedef boost::mpl::int_<C> RMC;
00038     typedef detail::NestedIterator<T,N,C> Iterator;
00039     typedef ArrayRef<T,N-1,(N==C)?(N-1):((C>0)?C:0)> Reference;
00040     typedef Array<T,N-1,(N==C)?(N-1):((C>0)?C:0)> Value;
00041     typedef detail::Core<N> Core;
00042     typedef typename Core::ConstPtr CorePtr;
00043 
00044     static Reference makeReference(Element * data, CorePtr const & core) {
00045         return Reference(data, core);
00046     }
00047     static Iterator makeIterator(Element * data, CorePtr const & core, int stride) {
00048         return Iterator(Reference(data, core), stride);
00049     }
00050 };
00051 
00052 template <typename T>
00053 struct ArrayTraits<T,1,0> {
00054     typedef T Element;
00055     typedef boost::mpl::int_<1> ND;
00056     typedef boost::mpl::int_<0> RMC;
00057     typedef detail::StridedIterator<Element> Iterator;
00058     typedef Element & Reference;
00059     typedef Element Value;
00060     typedef detail::Core<1> Core;
00061     typedef typename Core::ConstPtr CorePtr;
00062 
00063     static Reference makeReference(Element * data, CorePtr const & core) {
00064         return *data;
00065     }
00066     static Iterator makeIterator(Element * data, CorePtr const & core, int stride) {
00067         return Iterator(data, stride);
00068     }
00069 };

00072 struct ArrayTraits<T,1,1> {
00073     typedef T Element;
00074     typedef boost::mpl::int_<1> ND;
00075     typedef boost::mpl::int_<1> RMC;
00076     typedef Element * Iterator;
00077     typedef Element & Reference;
00078     typedef Element Value;
00079     typedef detail::Core<1> Core;
00080     typedef typename Core::ConstPtr CorePtr;
00081

00083         return *data;

00091 struct ArrayTraits<T,1,-1> {
00092     typedef T Element;
00093     typedef boost::mpl::int_<1> ND;
00094     typedef boost::mpl::int_<-1> RMC;
00095     typedef Element * Iterator;
00096     typedef Element & Reference;
00097     typedef Element Value;
00098     typedef detail::Core<1> Core;
00099     typedef typename Core::ConstPtr CorePtr;
00100

00102         return *data;

00105         return data;

00109 template <typename T, int N, int C>
00110 struct ExpressionTraits< Array<T,N,C> > : public ArrayTraits<T,N,C> {
00111     typedef Array<T,N,C> Self;
00112     typedef boost::mpl::false_ IsScalar;
00113 };
